ctu_text: pon@nic. in"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Hours: Monday - Friday, 2:30 pm to 5:00 pm"}]}], "process_md": "**Step 1:** The interested applicant should visit (on a working day, and during working hours) the Rajya Sainik Board, Jawan Bhawan, Department of Sainik Welfare, Government of Puducherry, 261, Lawspet Main Road, Pakkamudianpet, Puducherry Road, Lawspet, Puducherry - 605013, India, and request a hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form from the concerned authority. \n**Step 2:** In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required). \n**Step 3:** The interested applicant should submit the duly filled and signed application form and the documents to the concerned authority at the Rajya Sainik Board.
